casebody.data:
Eric Mel THOMPSON, et al., petitioners
v.
John AULT, Warden, et al. No. 14-6559. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 17, 2014.

Opinion *698Motion of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperisdenied. Petitioner allowed until December 8, 2014, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of Rules of this Court.
